Ruguo nimen meiyou zinu, namo, nimen de qi shi de nimen yichan de si fen zhi yi. Ruguo nimen you zinu, namo, tamen de nimen yichan de ba fen zhi yi.(Zhe zhong fenpei), xu zai jiaofu wang ren suo zhu de yizeng huo qingchang wang ren suo qian de zhaiwu zhihou. Ruguo bei jicheng de nanzi huo nuzi, shang wu fumu, xia wu zinu, zhiyou (tong mu yi fu de) geng duo de xiongdi he jiemei, namo, tamen he tamen, jun fen yichan de san fen zhi yi.(Zhe zhong fenpei), xu zai jiaofu wang ren suo zhu de yi?
zhexie shi zhenzhu de fadu. Shei fucong zhenzhu he shizhe, zhenzhu jiang shi shei ru na xia lin zhu he de leyuan, er yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi weida de chenggong.
Shei weikang zhenzhu he shizhe, bing chaoyue ta de fadu, zhenzhu jiang shi shei ru huo yu, er yong ju qizhong, ta jiang shou lingru de xingfa.
